thread.title: Micromax schedules March 29th event, expected to launch its first dual camera smartphone
thread.title_full: Micromax schedules March 29th event, expected to launch its first dual camera smartphone

title: Micromax schedules March 29th event, expected to launch its first dual camera smartphone
text:
Micromax schedules March 29th event, expected to launch its first dual camera... Micromax schedules March 29th event, expected to launch its first dual camera smartphone By March 21, 2017 “Micromax could be launching its first dual camera-toting smartphone next week” 
Micromax has scheduled a press event in Delhi on March 29th. The brand’s invite doesn’t reveal anything about it’s planning to unveil at the event. However, reports and speculations indicate that the company could unveil its first dual camera-toting smartphone at the event. Also, the vendor recently teased the launch of the same. The roar will silence the noise. Block your date to see the #Extraordinary pic.twitter.com/eYYdnaVhTg — Micromax India (@Micromax_Mobile) March 21, 2017 
As per the earlier reports, the new Micromax offering will feature a metal unibody design and a fingerprint sensor. It will likely come with dual 13MP cameras at the rear, accompanied by an LED flash. The handset is expected to offer a 5MP front shooter with an LED flash, a 5.5-inch FHD display, an octa-core SoC, 3GB or 4GB of RAM, 32GB/64GB of storage, 4G and VoLTE. Since these are based on leaks, keep in mind that the actual specs may be a tad different. The launch is just a week away, so stay tuned. Facebook Comments
